com.vangav.backend.images.segments_and_features

Class Segment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.images.segments_and_features.Segment

  • public class Segment
extends java.lang.Object
    Segment represents an image's segment A segment is a part of an image that has one or more feature(s) (shape, color, ...)
